author: Special Correspondent
text:
The MSME Development Institute, Coimbatore branch, will conduct a five-day training programme for gold appraisers at the institute here.

The training sessions will be on basic details about gold, silver and platinum, types of jewellery, purity of gold. Candidates should have studied up to Standard VIII and should be aged above 18 years. For details, contact: joint director, MSME Development Institute, 386 Patel Road, Ram Nagar, Coimbatore. Phone: 9952513348

Awards presented

CRI Pumps, in association with Tamilnadu Agriculture University, has presented the “Velanmai Chemmal” awards to five farmers recently.
title: Training programme
